email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight quote for the shipment of 5000MT of Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $85 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 250m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. We are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of $80 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $80 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
